TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit MKLocalSearchCompleterDelegate_Extensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Extension methods to the interface to support all the methods from the protocol.

remarks.para: The extension methods for allow developers to treat instances of the interface as having all the optional methods of the original protocol. Since the interface only contains the required members, these extension methods allow developers to call the optional members of the protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void DidFail (this MapKit.IMKLocalSearchCompleterDelegate This, MapKit.MKLocalSearchCompleter completer, Foundation.NSError error);

Docs.param: The instance on which this extension method operates on.
The search completer to which this delegate belongs.
Docs.summary: The search completer encountered an error while searching for completions.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void DidUpdateResults (this MapKit.IMKLocalSearchCompleterDelegate This, MapKit.MKLocalSearchCompleter completer);
.method public static hidebysig void DidUpdateResults(class MapKit.IMKLocalSearchCompleterDelegate This, class MapKit.MKLocalSearchCompleter completer) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance on which this extension method operates on.
The search completer to which this delegate belongs.
Docs.summary: The search completer updated the results with new search completions.

remarks.para: After this method is called, developers can check the property for the newest results.
